<rule xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset" id="javax-to-jakarta-servlet-00060">
            <when>
                <javaclass references="javax.servlet.ServletRequestWrapper.getRealPath(java.lang.String)"/>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="Method in javax.servlet.ServletRequestWrapper has been removed">
                    <message>
                        Method `getRealPath` in javax.servlet.ServletRequestWrapper has been removed. It can be replaced with `ServletContext.getRealPath(String path)`.
                    </message>
                    <link href="https://access.redhat.com/articles/6980265#servlet" title="Red Hat JBoss EAP Application Migration from Jakarta EE 8 to EE 10 - Jakarta Servlet"/>
                </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
